description: Ceremonies and social media posts honour the memory of those killed by militant Islamists in 2015.
title: Charlie Hebdo: France marks five years since Paris massacre
title_page: Charlie Hebdo: France marks five years since Paris massacre - BBC News
maintext: The weekly magazine, which published a special issue marking the anniversary with contributions from the victims' relatives, tweeted: "It was five years ago, it was a century ago, it was yesterday. We do not forget and we will always continue: to speak, to write, to draw."
